title: SHOOK
overview: SHOOK centers around Mia, a 15-year-old who yearns to dance professionally but is hindered by daily obligations to her little sister, Skylar, and their single mom, Sandra, a registered nurse. Although Mia struggles to convey how she feels, she has the support of her extroverted best friend, Fredgy, and a new mentor, Ritz, who introduces her to the vibrant world of street dance. She soon begins to express her true and best self through dance.
